<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===-- llvm/ADT/Hashing.h - Utilities for hashing --------------&#42;- C++ -&#42;-===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This file implements the newly proposed standard C++ interfaces for hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// arbitrary data and building hash functions for user-defined types. This</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// interface was originally proposed in N3333&#91;1&#93; and is currently under review</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for inclusion in a future TR and/or standard.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The primary interfaces provide are comprised of one type and three functions:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;code&#39; class is an opaque type representing the hash code for some</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     data. It is the intended product of hashing, and can be used to implement</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     hash tables, checksumming, and other common uses of hashes. It is not an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     integer type (although it can be converted to one) because it is risky</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     to assume much about the internals of a hash&#95;code. In particular, each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     execution of the program has a high probability of producing a different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     hash&#95;code for a given input. Thus their values are not stable to save or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     persist, and should only be used during the execution for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     construction of hashing datastructures.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;value&#39; is a function designed to be overloaded for each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     user-defined type which wishes to be used within a hashing context. It</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     should be overloaded within the user-defined type&#39;s namespace and found</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     via ADL. Overloads for primitive types are provided by this library.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  -- &#39;hash&#95;combine&#39; and &#39;hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#39; are functions designed to aid</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      programmers in easily and intuitively combining a set of data into</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      a single hash&#95;code for their object. They should only logically be used</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//      within the implementation of a &#39;hash&#95;value&#39; routine or similar context.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Note that &#39;hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#39; contains very special logic for hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a contiguous array of integers or pointers. This logic is &#42;extremely&#42; fast,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// on a modern Intel &quot;Gainestown&quot; Xeon (Nehalem uarch) @2.2 GHz, these were</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// benchmarked at over 6.5 GiB/s for large keys, and &lt;20 cycles/hash for keys</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// under 32-bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// An opaque object representing a hash code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This object represents the result of hashing some entity. It is intended to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be used to implement hashtables or other hashing-based data structures.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// While it wraps and exposes a numeric value, this value should not be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// trusted to be stable or predictable across processes or executions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// In order to obtain the hash&#95;code for an object &#39;x&#39;:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   using llvm::hash&#95;value;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///   llvm::hash&#95;code code = hash&#95;value(x);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\endcode</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for any integer value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Note that this function is intended to compute the same hash&#95;code for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a particular value without regard to the pre-promotion type. This is in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// contrast to hash&#95;combine which may produce different hash&#95;codes for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// differing argument types even if they would implicit promote to a common</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// type without changing the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;integral&#95;or&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value, hash&#95;code&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a pointer&#39;s address.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &#42;ptr);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a standard string.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a standard string.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; hash&#95;code <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::optional&lt;T&gt; &amp;arg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All of the implementation details of actually computing the various hash</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// code values are held within this namespace. These routines are included in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the header file mainly to allow inlining and constant propagation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing">hashing</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(&amp;result, p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(result));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ab9f705441a3a825d4b8a93ca4476d4e7">sys::IsBigEndianHost</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ad0e418047a3e04c4fd1fb83325b571ae">sys::swapByteOrder</a>(result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;p) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(&amp;result, p, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(result));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ab9f705441a3a825d4b8a93ca4476d4e7">sys::IsBigEndianHost</a>)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#ad0e418047a3e04c4fd1fb83325b571ae">sys::swapByteOrder</a>(result);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> result;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Some primes between 2^63 and 2^64 for various uses.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a> = 0xc3a5c85c97cb3127ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a> = 0xb492b66fbe98f273ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> = 0x9ae16a3b2f90404fULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">constexpr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a> = 0xc949d7c7509e6557ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Bitwise right rotate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Normally this will compile to a single instruction, especially if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// shift is a manifest constant.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494">rotate</a>(uint64&#95;t val, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shift) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Avoid shifting by 64: doing so yields an undefined result.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> shift == 0 ? val : ((val &gt;&gt; shift) | (val &lt;&lt; (64 - shift)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(uint64&#95;t val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> val ^ (val &gt;&gt; 47);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(uint64&#95;t low, uint64&#95;t high) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Murmur-inspired hashing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t kMul = 0x9ddfea08eb382d69ULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t a = (low ^ high) &#42; kMul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a ^= (a &gt;&gt; 47);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t b = (high ^ a) &#42; kMul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  b ^= (b &gt;&gt; 47);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">  b &#42;= kMul;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9">hash&#95;1to3&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t a = s&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t b = s&#91;len &gt;&gt; 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint8&#95;t c = s&#91;len - 1&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t y = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(a) + (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(b) &lt;&lt; 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint32&#95;t z = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(len) + (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint32&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(c) &lt;&lt; 2);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(y &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> ^ z &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a> ^ seed) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f">hash&#95;4to8&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(len + (a &lt;&lt; 3), seed ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s + len - 4));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3">hash&#95;9to16&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(seed ^ a, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4ffb910d18d978660569ea44ac87e494">rotate</a>(b + len, len)) ^ b;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3">hash&#95;17to32&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t d = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a - b, 43) +</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(c ^ seed, 30) + d,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       a + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(b ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a955d5d8e5c62042ded7184cc9e0516de">k3</a>, 20) - c + len + seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042">hash&#95;33to64&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> len, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 24);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s) + (len + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16)) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a + z, 52);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 37);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  c += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t vf = a + z;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t vs = b + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 31) + c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 32);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">  z = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">  b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a + z, 52);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 37);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 24);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">  c += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + len - 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t wf = a + z;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t ws = b + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 31) + c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t r = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>((vf + ws) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> + (wf + vs) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>((seed ^ (r &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aa14801ceabdb9a21f12353bb2157bd9f">k0</a>)) + vs) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8">hash&#95;short</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> length, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &gt;= 4 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 8)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a47f5fadf2eb86ee5088924d5760dae3f">hash&#95;4to8&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &gt; 8 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a17851b50e69ca9482ea8fb104ae202b3">hash&#95;9to16&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &gt; 16 &amp;&amp; length &lt;= 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6fd531b33128989cc9e90c8e08b876d3">hash&#95;17to32&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &gt; 32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ab41bb88af8fda8fa4eaa0f41ccc98042">hash&#95;33to64&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length != 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a04c178b7e1b96b98934763374a4485d9">hash&#95;1to3&#95;bytes</a>(s, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a56c87fc8a8726f0caf29ef182189d3b3">k2</a> ^ seed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The intermediate state used during hashing.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Currently, the algorithm for computing hash codes is based on CityHash and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// keeps 56 bytes of arbitrary state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199">h0</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a066e9765c5bc2a3e6240cea24123e89a">h1</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ac3fb731f4a7cf1257cc129b1d3119b71">h2</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a472772dcef33b525c2f458ce5ed37554">h3</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afae92e6488bf8e65c72f1d96ad9edb8c">h4</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a92a5fa1b3b425299ac1ce8d7daff0b27">h5</a> = 0, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#adeeb0bb9c8445a9f89e46c8af40553fe">h6</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Create a new hash&#95;state structure and initialize it based on the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// seed and the first 64-byte chunk.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This effectively performs the initial mix.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4">create</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, uint64&#95;t seed) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> state = &#123;0,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        seed,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(seed, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(seed ^ <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>, 49),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        seed &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#aaebf1b7abefd58ee53874924675a8884">shift&#95;mix</a>(seed),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        0&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">    state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#adeeb0bb9c8445a9f89e46c8af40553fe">h6</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afae92e6488bf8e65c72f1d96ad9edb8c">h4</a>, state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a92a5fa1b3b425299ac1ce8d7daff0b27">h5</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><span class="doxyHighlight">    state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde">mix</a>(s);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> state;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Mix 32-bytes from the input sequence into the 16-bytes of &#39;a&#39;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and &#39;b&#39;, including whatever is already in &#39;a&#39; and &#39;b&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a6e2b4cb1c01e3fd1504a02bd613677fd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a6e2b4cb1c01e3fd1504a02bd613677fd">mix&#95;32&#95;bytes</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s, uint64&#95;t &amp;a, uint64&#95;t &amp;b) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">    a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t c = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 24);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(b + a + c, 21);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t d = a;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">    a += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8) + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    b += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(a, 44) + d;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    a += c;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Mix in a 64-byte buffer of data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We mix all 64 bytes even when the chunk length is smaller, but we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// record the actual length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde">mix</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199">h0</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#afd7bc94b3368f293d73243e0c2252199">h0</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a066e9765c5bc2a3e6240cea24123e89a">h1</a> + <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a472772dcef33b525c2f458ce5ed37554">h3</a> + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a6af5e05ffaf0980f306a818bbe587f41">fetch64</a>(s + 8), 37) &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8024b8ff1557e1fb8d1c607b1420de02">k1</a>;</span></CodeLine>
