<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Trait to indicate whether a type&#39;s bits can be hashed directly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A type trait which is true if we want to combine values for hashing by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// reading the underlying data. It is false if values of this type must</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// first be passed to hash&#95;value, and the resulting hash&#95;codes combined.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: We want to replace is&#95;integral&#95;or&#95;enum and is&#95;pointer here with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a predicate which asserts that comparing the underlying storage of two</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values of the type for equality is equivalent to comparing the two values</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for equality. For all the platforms we care about, this holds for integers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and pointers, but there are platforms where it doesn&#39;t and we would like to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// support user-defined types which happen to satisfy this property.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/is-hashable-data"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/is-hashable-data">is&#95;hashable&#95;data</a></span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  : std::integral&#95;constant&lt;bool, ((is&#95;integral&#95;or&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   std::is&#95;pointer&lt;T&gt;::value) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  64 % sizeof(T) == 0)&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Special case std::pair to detect when both types are viable and when there</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is no alignment-derived padding in the pair. This is a bit of a lie because</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// std::pair isn&#39;t truly POD, but it&#39;s close enough in all reasonable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// implementations for our use case of hashing the underlying data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/is-hashable-data-c5ff1c17472038b6f5efad36061925b9"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> U&gt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/is-hashable-data">is&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std">std</a>::pair&lt;T, U&gt; &gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">  : std::integral&#95;constant&lt;bool, (is&#95;hashable&#95;data&lt;T&gt;::value &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  is&#95;hashable&#95;data&lt;U&gt;::value &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                  (sizeof(T) + sizeof(U)) ==</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                   sizeof(std::pair&lt;T, U&gt;))&gt; &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper to get the hashable data representation for a type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This variant is enabled when the type itself can be used.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;hashable&#95;data&lt;T&gt;::value, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> value;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper to get the hashable data representation for a type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This variant is enabled when we must first call hash&#95;value and use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// result as our data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;!is&#95;hashable&#95;data&lt;T&gt;::value, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a1b139223f5e7f4da69193a531a5f1082"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight">::<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">llvm::hash&#95;value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper to store data from a value into a buffer and advance the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// pointer into that buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This routine first checks whether there is enough space in the provided</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// buffer, and if not immediately returns false. If there is space, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// copies the underlying bytes of value into the buffer, advances the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// buffer&#95;ptr past the copied bytes, and returns true.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8">store&#95;and&#95;advance</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;&amp;buffer&#95;ptr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;end, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&amp; value,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> offset = 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> store&#95;size = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">sizeof</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value) - offset;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (buffer&#95;ptr + store&#95;size &gt; buffer&#95;end)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;value&#95;data = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlight">  memcpy(buffer&#95;ptr, value&#95;data + offset, store&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  buffer&#95;ptr += store&#95;size;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Implement the combining of integral values into a hash&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This overload is selected when the value type of the iterator is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// integral. Rather than computing a hash&#95;code for each object and then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// combining them, this (as an optimization) directly combines the integers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InputIteratorT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4b425f997c3d2172f7b92a4598332b37"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4b425f997c3d2172f7b92a4598332b37">hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#95;impl</a>(InputIteratorT first, InputIteratorT last) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t seed = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8a572c218eb50cd07af7265347c113a8">get&#95;execution&#95;seed</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> buffer&#91;64&#93;, &#42;buffer&#95;ptr = buffer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> buffer&#95;end = std::end(buffer);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (first != last &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8">store&#95;and&#95;advance</a>(buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                            <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(&#42;first)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (first == last)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8">hash&#95;short</a>(buffer, buffer&#95;ptr - buffer, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(buffer&#95;ptr == buffer&#95;end);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> state = state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4">create</a>(buffer, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> length = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (first != last) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fill up the buffer. We don&#39;t clear it, which re-mixes the last round</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// when only a partial 64-byte chunk is left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><span class="doxyHighlight">    buffer&#95;ptr = buffer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (first != last &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8">store&#95;and&#95;advance</a>(buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(&#42;first)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++first;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00412" /><CodeLine lineNumber="412"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00413" /><CodeLine lineNumber="413"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rotate the buffer if we did a partial fill in order to simulate doing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="414"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a mix of the last 64-bytes. That is how the algorithm works when we</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="415"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// have a contiguous byte sequence, and we want to emulate that here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00416" /><CodeLine lineNumber="416"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::rotate(buffer, buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00417" /><CodeLine lineNumber="417"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mix this chunk into the current state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">    state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#ab7b8ef7c970f0050e15688a0a3241fde">mix</a>(buffer);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">    length += buffer&#95;ptr - buffer;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a559abae71ae014e4c9420a7a23d25dc6">finalize</a>(length);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Implement the combining of integral values into a hash&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This overload is selected when the value type of the iterator is integral</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and when the input iterator is actually a pointer. Rather than computing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a hash&#95;code for each object and then combining them, this (as an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// optimization) directly combines the integers. Also, because the integers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// are stored in contiguous memory, this routine avoids copying each value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00433" /><CodeLine lineNumber="433"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and directly reads from the underlying memory.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00434" /><CodeLine lineNumber="434"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ValueT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;hashable&#95;data&lt;ValueT&gt;::value, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a>&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a3978afe88908efc4773a9c2a7796e27b"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4b425f997c3d2172f7b92a4598332b37">hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#95;impl</a>(ValueT &#42;first, ValueT &#42;last) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t seed = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8a572c218eb50cd07af7265347c113a8">get&#95;execution&#95;seed</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s&#95;begin = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(first);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s&#95;end = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(last);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> length = std::distance(s&#95;begin, s&#95;end);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &lt;= 64)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8">hash&#95;short</a>(s&#95;begin, length, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00443" /><CodeLine lineNumber="443"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s&#95;aligned&#95;end = s&#95;begin + (length &amp; ~63);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> state = state.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state/#a304239d286ddae5c8c7c04974964e1e4">create</a>(s&#95;begin, seed);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  s&#95;begin += 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (s&#95;begin != s&#95;aligned&#95;end) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">    state.mix(s&#95;begin);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">    s&#95;begin += 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length &amp; 63)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">    state.mix(s&#95;end - 64);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> state.finalize(length);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute a hash&#95;code for a sequence of values.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This hashes a sequence of values. It produces the same hash&#95;code as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#39;hash&#95;combine(a, b, c, ...)&#39;, but can run over arbitrary sized sequences</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// and is significantly faster given pointers and types which can be hashed as</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// a sequence of bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> InputIteratorT&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80edfc5e42059e045aa7bf7fe42bee3"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#af80edfc5e42059e045aa7bf7fe42bee3">hash&#95;combine&#95;range</a>(InputIteratorT first, InputIteratorT last) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  return ::llvm::hashing::detail::hash&#95;combine&#95;range&#95;impl(first, last);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implementation details for hash&#95;combine.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">hashing &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper class to manage the recursive combining of hash&#95;combine</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// arguments.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class exists to manage the state and various calls involved in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// recursive combining of arguments used in hash&#95;combine. It is particularly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// useful at minimizing the code in the recursive calls to ease the pain</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// caused by a lack of variadic functions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#aed86896537853171897bf29f113e382f">hash&#95;combine&#95;recursive&#95;helper</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>&#91;64&#93; = &#123;&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-state">hash&#95;state</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae2729f7986639d793d41f13ab4707c7b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae2729f7986639d793d41f13ab4707c7b">seed</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a recursive hash combining helper.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This sets up the state for a recursive hash combine, including getting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the seed and buffer setup.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#aed86896537853171897bf29f113e382f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#aed86896537853171897bf29f113e382f">hash&#95;combine&#95;recursive&#95;helper</a>()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">    : <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae2729f7986639d793d41f13ab4707c7b">seed</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8a572c218eb50cd07af7265347c113a8">get&#95;execution&#95;seed</a>()) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Combine one chunk of data into the current in-flight hash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This merges one chunk of data into the hash. First it tries to buffer</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the data. If the buffer is full, it hashes the buffer into its</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// hash&#95;state, empties it, and then merges the new chunk in. This also</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handles cases where the data straddles the end of the buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a87cb33524db506474a9207907036a397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a87cb33524db506474a9207907036a397">combine&#95;data</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;length, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;ptr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;end, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp/#ad2fefd8832b4b1ea3dbb1f621063bbff">data</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00505" /><CodeLine lineNumber="505"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8">store&#95;and&#95;advance</a>(buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp/#ad2fefd8832b4b1ea3dbb1f621063bbff">data</a>)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00506" /><CodeLine lineNumber="506"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check for skew which prevents the buffer from being packed, and do</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// a partial store into the buffer to fill it. This is only a concern</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the variadic combine because that formation can have varying</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// argument types.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> partial&#95;store&#95;size = buffer&#95;end - buffer&#95;ptr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">      memcpy(buffer&#95;ptr, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp/#ad2fefd8832b4b1ea3dbb1f621063bbff">data</a>, partial&#95;store&#95;size);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the store fails, our buffer is full and ready to hash. We have to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// either initialize the hash state (on the first full buffer) or mix</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// this buffer into the existing hash state. Length tracks the &#42;hashed&#42;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// length, not the buffered length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a> = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a>.create(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae2729f7986639d793d41f13ab4707c7b">seed</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">        length = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mix this chunk into the current state and bump length up by 64</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a>.mix(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">        length += 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Reset the buffer&#95;ptr to the head of the buffer for the next chunk of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// data.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">      buffer&#95;ptr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try again to store into the buffer -- this cannot fail as we only</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// store types smaller than the buffer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a0e6505cf45fca2d42d6d02ba7fcde5b8">store&#95;and&#95;advance</a>(buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/staticdatasplitter-cpp/#ad2fefd8832b4b1ea3dbb1f621063bbff">data</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><span class="doxyHighlight">                             partial&#95;store&#95;size))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;buffer smaller than stored type&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> buffer&#95;ptr;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Recursive, variadic combining method.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This function recurses through each argument, combining that argument</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// into a single hash.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ...Ts&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae78cbf87cf9f0f59522d779be5d49cbb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae78cbf87cf9f0f59522d779be5d49cbb">combine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> length, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;ptr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;end,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> &amp;arg, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ts &amp;...<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxlowerargs-cpp/#a4d6da696b3c753c5e5fbcc4d21d4cb71">args</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    buffer&#95;ptr = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a87cb33524db506474a9207907036a397">combine&#95;data</a>(length, buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4d42cd18d93c269fe8878db27f2ff8cc">get&#95;hashable&#95;data</a>(arg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recurse to the next argument.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae78cbf87cf9f0f59522d779be5d49cbb">combine</a>(length, buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxlowerargs-cpp/#a4d6da696b3c753c5e5fbcc4d21d4cb71">args</a>...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Base case for recursive, variadic combining.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The base case when combining arguments recursively is reached when all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// arguments have been handled. It flushes the remaining buffer and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// constructs a hash&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a3f4bcef234eab8fcdd8e4496777e5a9b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a3f4bcef234eab8fcdd8e4496777e5a9b">combine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> length, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;ptr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;buffer&#95;end) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check whether the entire set of values fit in the buffer. If so, we&#39;ll</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// use the optimized short hashing routine and skip state entirely.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (length == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a9f8d3250fbca36e49b9c1304f31bdfb8">hash&#95;short</a>(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>, buffer&#95;ptr - <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae2729f7986639d793d41f13ab4707c7b">seed</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mix the final buffer, rotating it if we did a partial fill in order to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// simulate doing a mix of the last 64-bytes. That is how the algorithm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// works when we have a contiguous byte sequence, and we want to emulate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::rotate(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>, buffer&#95;ptr, buffer&#95;end);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mix this chunk into the current state.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a>.mix(<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">    length += buffer&#95;ptr - <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ab3a478c7eb60d5611567b565b6d7a036">state</a>.finalize(length);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Combine values into a single hash&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This routine accepts a varying number of arguments of any type. It will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// attempt to combine them into a single hash&#95;code. For user-defined types it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// attempts to call a \\see hash&#95;value overload (via ADL) for the type. For</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// integer and pointer types it directly combines their data into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// resulting hash&#95;code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The result is suitable for returning from a user&#39;s hash&#95;value</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;implementation&#42; for their user-defined type. Consumers of a type should</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &#42;not&#42; call this routine, they should instead call &#39;hash&#95;value&#39;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add71474638430694c84640146383fc44"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ...Ts&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#add71474638430694c84640146383fc44">hash&#95;combine</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Ts &amp;...<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxlowerargs-cpp/#a4d6da696b3c753c5e5fbcc4d21d4cb71">args</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Recursively hash each argument using a helper class.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper">::llvm::hashing::detail::hash&#95;combine&#95;recursive&#95;helper</a> helper;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> helper.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#ae78cbf87cf9f0f59522d779be5d49cbb">combine</a>(0, helper.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a>, helper.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/hashing/detail/hash-combine-recursive-helper/#a9e4f6895ae5d3fc7cef9a42a9a6667e2">buffer</a> + 64, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/nvptx/nvptxlowerargs-cpp/#a4d6da696b3c753c5e5fbcc4d21d4cb71">args</a>...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Implementation details for implementations of hash&#95;value overloads provided</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">hashing &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/detail">detail</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper to hash the value of a single integer.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Overloads for smaller integer types are not provided to ensure consistent</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// behavior in the presence of integral promotions. Essentially,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// &quot;hash&#95;value(&#39;4&#39;)&quot; and &quot;hash&#95;value(&#39;0&#39; + 4)&quot; should be the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4fa6656e1c72b2fb9a6ed0659d3e248f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a4fa6656e1c72b2fb9a6ed0659d3e248f">hash&#95;integer&#95;value</a>(uint64&#95;t value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Similar to hash&#95;4to8&#95;bytes but using a seed instead of length.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t seed = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8a572c218eb50cd07af7265347c113a8">get&#95;execution&#95;seed</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;s = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">reinterpret&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">char</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(&amp;value);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t a = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#ad83862adf1fbf2399e28c062421d6a9b">hash&#95;16&#95;bytes</a>(seed + (a &lt;&lt; 3), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/hashing/detail/#a8b7aec03f89d9512ce1a14a3308ca161">fetch32</a>(s + 4));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace detail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Declared and documented above, but defined here so that any of the hashing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// infrastructure is available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> T&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a12f42924ca6c2ff4eb6fc2ebb3577897"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::enable&#95;if&#95;t&lt;is&#95;integral&#95;or&#95;enum&lt;T&gt;::value, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/hash-code">hash&#95;code</a>&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0e2e479cf4860dc8a00614e36ee3d5e9">hash&#95;value</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a> value) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">  return ::llvm::hashing::detail::hash&#95;integer&#95;value(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">uint64&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(value));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  return ::llvm::hashing::detail::hash&#95;integer&#95;value(</span></CodeLine>
